name: Soccer Championship-Freekick
description:
Chance to score under various conditions!
Try for the best score with spectacular free kick!

[Game Feature]
- Enjoy fun and exciting free kick game with simple one-touch control.
- Control the strength of the kick to achieve various kicks including curved kick and dipping kick.
- Provides diverse customize features to express your individuality.
- Provides various play modes including Stage, Mini Game, and Multi Mode.
- Supports multi-player mode for competing against other players throughout the world.
- Supports 16 languages.
- Supports Achievement System and Leaderboard.
- Game can be played without internet connection.
